title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Competencies: Project-Based Learning for Building Pharmacy Education Assessment Culture

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can derive course improvement plans with over 80% accuracy by analyzing educational assessment data.
Learners can establish and present at least one team-based action plan to build an assessment culture using Problem-Based Learning (PBL).
Learners can propose three or more instructional improvement strategies based on assessment results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
